scripts.perf:clean: rm isolate* || echo 'no files to remove'
scripts.perf:measure: npm run tsc && npm run perf:clean && node --prof build/cli/poly.js --config config.json --name profile
scripts.perf:show: npm run perf:measure && node --prof-process --preprocess -j isolate*.log | node_modules/.bin/flamebearer
